root_cause.issue: Render backend not using MASTER Supabase JWT secret
root_cause.detail: Pipeline-core.int.celeste7.ai verifies JWTs with wrong secret
root_cause.deployment_issue: Render env var MASTER_SUPABASE_JWT_SECRET not set or incorrect

impact.login: Users can authenticate with MASTER Supabase

required_fix.value_source: Supabase Dashboard > MASTER project (qvzmkaamzaqxpzbewjxe) > Project Settings > API > JWT Secret

notes: Code changes were committed to handle both MASTER_SUPABASE_JWT_SECRET and TENANT_SUPABASE_JWT_SECRET
The issue is purely infrastructure - env var not configured in Render
This blocks ALL production testing until resolved
